name: vdt-loader
description: A loader of vdt for webpack.

scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.prelease: npm version prerelease --preid beta && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.prelease-patch: npm version prepatch --preid beta && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.prelease-minor: npm version preminor --preid beta && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.prelease-major: npm version premajor --preid beta && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=beta

author: jiawei23716@sina.com
